page.title: 07Employment in Vernham CP
page.content: Employment in the area is restricted to agriculture. Jobs in general agriculture range from owner farmers, tractor drivers, herdsmen to shepherds. In ancillary agriculture jobs range from gamekeepers, manager and support staff of an intensive poultry rearing unit to a self-employed contractor specilising in crop spraying and a self-employed steel erector supplying farm buildings. Conholt Manor, which is the largest land owner in the area, is the largest single employer. Other employment for people in the area involves travelling, in general, to the local towns. The range of occupations includes a dentist, a doctor, waterboard workers, a milkman, a car mechanic, a teacher, Ministry of Defence workers etc.
